Containers.Name: suchja-wine
Containers.Description: Have you ever wanted to run an application for Microsoft Windows in a Docker container? I did and that is what you can use this image for.[br] My motivation for this image was to be able to create windows installer packages (known as MSI). Thus I'm using this image as a base image for suchja/wix. I'm sure that there are lots of other use cases. If you have one, please leave a comment on the docker hub repository for this image.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where Wine will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/Input[/b] This is where Wine will scan for ripped discs.[br][br] [b]/Output[/b] This is where Wine will output converted videos. [br][br]
